email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax, built in 2018, with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, I was hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Also, can we extend the laycan to October 15-22? Let me know your thoughts. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I understand your position on the freight rate. I can adjust the rate to $51.00 per metric ton, which I believe is fair given the vessel's specifications and current market conditions. As for the laycan, I can extend it to October 15-22. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 per metric ton sounds reasonable. I agree to the adjusted rate and the extended laycan. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that we're aligned on the rate and laycan. The demurrage rate is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. I'll send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if there are any other details you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I'll review the charter party agreement and get back to you by end of day. Looking forward to finalizing this deal. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, sounds good. I'll be on standby for your feedback on the charter party agreement. Let me know if you need any clarifications. Looking forward to closing this deal. Best, Sarah
